assignment5_000813686

Class WheelSlice

  • java.lang.Object
    • assignment5_000813686.WheelSlice

  • public class WheelSlice
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents on of the subdivisions of a wheel of fortune. It is meant to be used with the class Wheel. Within Wheel, each WheelSlice is meant to represent actually two subdivisions of the wheel.

      • getColor

        public javafx.scene.paint.Color getColor()

      • draw

        public void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                 double startAngle,
                 double xValue,
                 double yValue,
                 double radius)
        Drawing the slice as an arc in a graphics context.
        Parameters:
        gc - Graphics context in which the slice will be drawn.
        startAngle - The start angle of the drawn slice.
        xValue - The x-coordinate of the location of the slice, top-left corner of the CIRCLE in which the round arc is located.
        yValue - The y-coordinate of the location of the slice, top-left corner of the CIRCLE in which the round arc is located.
        radius - The radius of the CIRCLE taken as a base for drawing the arc (slice).

      • drawLegend

        public void drawLegend(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc,
                       double xValue,
                       double yValue)
        Draws the legend of the slice.
        Parameters:
        gc - Graphics context in which the legend will be drawn
        xValue - The x-coordinate of the location of the legend, top-left corner
        yValue - The y-coordinate of the location of the legend, top-left corner
